import React from "react"; import Container from "react-bootstrap/Container"; import Row from "react-bootstrap/Row"; import Col from "react-bootstrap/Col"; import "./about.styles.css"; import Profile from "../../assets/img/profile/myAvatar.jpg"; import Image from "react-bootstrap/Image"; import Button from "react-bootstrap/Button"; const About = () => { return (

ABOUT ME

Hi there! My name is Trần Nguyễn Thành Phẫm
I am studying at University of Information and Technology.
My short-term goal is to find a suitable position for myself.
My long-term goal is to work in a company enable me to improve my knowledge.
{/*

); }; export default About;
